Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in an exam within the PaNotify system. Questions can be multiple choice or identification type, with options and correct answers.
Version:
1.0
Author:
PaNotify Team

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question()
      Default constructor for Question.

    • Question

      public Question(int examId, String questionText, String options, int correctOption, int points)
      Parameterized constructor to create a new question with essential information.
      Parameters:
      examId - ID of the exam this question belongs to
      questionText - The text of the question
      options - Multiple options separated by | character
      correctOption - Index of the correct option (0-based)
      points - Point value of the question

  • Method Details

    • getQuestionId

      public int getQuestionId()
      Gets the question ID.
      Returns:
      The question ID

    • setQuestionId

      public void setQuestionId(int questionId)
      Sets the question ID.
      Parameters:
      questionId - The question ID to set

      Sets the exam ID.
      Parameters:

    • getQuestionText

      public String getQuestionText()
      Gets the text of the question.
      Returns:
      The question text

    • setQuestionText

      public void setQuestionText(String questionText)
      Sets the text of the question.
      Parameters:
      questionText - The question text to set

    • getOptions

      public String getOptions()
      Gets the options for the question. For multiple choice questions, options are separated by | character. For identification questions, this contains the answer.
      Returns:
      The options string

    • setOptions

      public void setOptions(String options)
      Sets the options for the question. For multiple choice questions, options should be separated by | character. For identification questions, this should contain the answer.
      Parameters:
      options - The options string to set

    • getCorrectOption

      public int getCorrectOption()
      Gets the index of the correct option for multiple choice questions.
      Returns:
      The index of the correct option (0-based)

    • setCorrectOption

      public void setCorrectOption(int correctOption)
      Sets the index of the correct option for multiple choice questions.
      Parameters:
      correctOption - The index of the correct option (0-based) to set

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the point value of the question.
      Returns:
      The points

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints(int points)
      Sets the point value of the question.
      Parameters:
      points - The points to set

    • getCorrectAnswer

      public String getCorrectAnswer()
      Gets the correct answer as a string. For multiple choice questions, returns the text of the correct option. For identification questions, returns the answer directly.
      Returns:
      The correct answer as a string

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Question object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the question's key information
